item.title: Jerome Powell will attend Supreme Court hearing on Lisa Cook’s firing
item.description: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, who has been a target of the Trump administration, is showing a sign of unity with another central-bank member.

item.title: ‘I still have a mortgage’: I’m no longer confident that my costs will actually fall in retirement. What can I do?
item.description: “I think my withdrawals from my 401(k) and IRA may need to be larger than my current take-home pay.”

item.title: ‘I have an economics degree from a fantastic university’: I’m 71 with $3 million and earn $250K. Is it time to retire?
item.description: “I have a home worth $1.2 million and owe $300,000 at 3% interest.”

item.title: My sister is buying our parents’ $3 million house, but wants to deduct $100K for renovations. Who’s right?
item.description: “If she didn’t want the home, it would have been sold at fair market value.”

item.title: ‘I have no mortgage’: Is it reckless to cancel my homeowner’s insurance? I can’t justify $4K a year anymore.
